definition: To travel extensively and visit various places, typically for exploration, discovery, or leisure purposes. It often involves exploring different regions, cities, or countries, and can be done for personal enjoyment, cultural enrichment, or professional research.

examples.german: Ich möchte gerne die Welt bereisen.
examples.english: I would like to travel the world.
He has traveled to many countries.
We will soon travel to Africa.

examples.german: Es ist sein Traum, die Galaxie zu bereisen.
examples.english: It is his dream to travel the galaxy.
